headline.main: China Finance Ministry Releases $151 Billion Defense Budget
headline.print_headline: China Finance Ministry Releases $151 Billion Defense Budget

lead_paragraph: China's finance ministry said Sunday that the country's defense budget this year will top 1 trillion yuan ($145 billion) for the first time, after the exact figure was initially kept out of public documents released at the start of the country's annual legislative sessions.
